AltName.entry: STOVIN, UTTLEY AND GREENLAND TARA/MAIN ROAD ESTATES

Desc.entry: Represents tenants' and residents' interests from Stovin, Uttely, Greenland and Main Road estates in all matters relating to Sheffield City Council and Sheffield Homes.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 3rd Thurs in the month, except Aug and Dec (sub group & public meetings)
